closed_reason: Added DELETE /api/boards/:boardId endpoint with auth validation. Backend deleteBoard() in auth.ts performs SQL DELETE with user ownership check. Frontend adds remove button on board items (appears on hover, turns red) with confirmation dialog. Board list refreshes after removal. Non-destructive - boards can reconnect later.
description: Add option to remove old/offline boards from the cloud dashboard board list
notes: 2026-01-16 20:50 - Implemented board removal feature. Key points: (1) DELETE endpoint validates user ownership before deleting, (2) Removal is non-destructive - agents can reconnect and re-register the board, (3) UI shows remove button only on hover to avoid accidental clicks, (4) Confirmation dialog warns user that board can reconnect later.
title: Cloud: Allow removing boards from dashboard list
